projects.name: Mitt
projects.description: A productivity tool that helps with daily task management and tracking.
key_decisions: Focus on Mitt UI improvements first
Review and refactor the Mitt codebase by end of week (high priority)
action_items: Set up meeting with design team for UI mockups (medium priority)
Research React Native vs Flutter for mobile app (low priority)
insights: User feedback shows that simplicity is key for adoption
Mobile accessibility is becoming increasingly important

projects.name: Data Analytics Dashboard

key_decisions: Postpone the analytics dashboard until Q2

projects.name: Mobile App
